00045 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00046  * @brief Deinitializes the EBI peripheral registers to their default reset values.
00047  * @retval None
00048  ************************************************************************************************************/
00049 void EBI_DeInit(void)
00050 {
00051   RSTCU_PeripReset_TypeDef RSTCUReset = {{0}};
00052 
00053   RSTCUReset.Bit.EBI = 1;
00054   RSTCU_PeripReset(RSTCUReset, ENABLE);
00055 }
00056 
00057 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00058  * @brief Initializes the EBI peripheral according to the specified parameters in the EBI_InitStruct.
00059  * @param EBI_InitStruct: pointer to a EBI_InitTypeDef structure.
00060  * @retval None
00061  ************************************************************************************************************/
00062 void EBI_Init(EBI_InitTypeDef* EBI_InitStruct)
00063 {
00064   u32 tmp;
00065   u32 bank = EBI_InitStruct->EBI_Bank;
00066 
00067   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00068   Assert_Param(IS_EBI_BANK(EBI_InitStruct->EBI_Bank));
00069   Assert_Param(IS_EBI_MODE(EBI_InitStruct->EBI_Mode));
00070   Assert_Param(IS_EBI_IDLECYCLE(EBI_InitStruct->EBI_IdleCycle));
00071   Assert_Param(IS_EBI_CS_POLARITY(EBI_InitStruct->EBI_ChipSelectPolarity));
00072   Assert_Param(IS_EBI_ALE_POLARITY(EBI_InitStruct->EBI_AddressLatchPolarity));
00073   Assert_Param(IS_EBI_WE_POLARITY(EBI_InitStruct->EBI_WriteEnablePolarity));
00074   Assert_Param(IS_EBI_RE_POLARITY(EBI_InitStruct->EBI_ReadEnablePolarity));
00075   Assert_Param(IS_EBI_IDLE_CYCLE_TIME(EBI_InitStruct->EBI_IdleCycleTime));
00076   Assert_Param(IS_EBI_ADDRESS_SETUP_TIME(EBI_InitStruct->EBI_AddressSetupTime));
00077   Assert_Param(IS_EBI_ADDRESS_HOLD_TIME(EBI_InitStruct->EBI_AddressHoldTime));
00078   Assert_Param(IS_EBI_WRITE_SETUP_TIME(EBI_InitStruct->EBI_WriteSetupTime));
00079   Assert_Param(IS_EBI_WRITE_STROBE_TIME(EBI_InitStruct->EBI_WriteStrobeTime));
00080   Assert_Param(IS_EBI_WRITE_HOLD_TIME(EBI_InitStruct->EBI_WriteHoldTime));
00081   Assert_Param(IS_EBI_READ_SETUP_TIME(EBI_InitStruct->EBI_ReadSetupTime));
00082   Assert_Param(IS_EBI_READ_STROBE_TIME(EBI_InitStruct->EBI_ReadStrobeTime));
00083 
00084   HT_EBI->ATR = EBI_InitStruct->EBI_AddressSetupTime |
00085                 (EBI_InitStruct->EBI_AddressHoldTime << 8);
00086   HT_EBI->RTR = EBI_InitStruct->EBI_ReadSetupTime |
00087                 (EBI_InitStruct->EBI_ReadStrobeTime << 8) |
00088                 (EBI_InitStruct->EBI_ReadHoldTime << 16);
00089 
00090   HT_EBI->WTR = EBI_InitStruct->EBI_WriteSetupTime |
00091                 (EBI_InitStruct->EBI_WriteStrobeTime << 8) |
00092                 (EBI_InitStruct->EBI_WriteHoldTime << 16);
00093   HT_EBI->PR = EBI_InitStruct->EBI_ChipSelectPolarity |
00094                (EBI_InitStruct->EBI_ReadEnablePolarity << 1) |
00095                (EBI_InitStruct->EBI_WriteEnablePolarity << 2) |
00096                (EBI_InitStruct->EBI_AddressLatchPolarity << 3);
00097 
00098 
00099   /*------------------------- EBI Control Register Configuration -------------------------------------------*/
00100   tmp = (3 << (bank * 2)) | (0x00001000 << bank) |
00101         (0x00010000 << (bank * 2)) | (0x00020000 << (bank * 2)) |
00102         (0x01000000 << bank);
00103   tmp = HT_EBI->CR & (~tmp);
00104   HT_EBI->CR = (EBI_InitStruct->EBI_Mode << (bank * 2)) |
00105                (EBI_InitStruct->EBI_IdleCycle << bank) |
00106                (EBI_InitStruct->EBI_IdleCycleTime << 28) | tmp;
00107 }
00108 
00109 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00110  * @brief  Fills each EBI_InitStruct member with its default value.
00111  * @param  EBI_InitStruct: pointer to an EBI_InitTypeDef structure.
00112  * @retval None
00113  ************************************************************************************************************/
00114 void EBI_StructInit(EBI_InitTypeDef* EBI_InitStruct)
00115 {
00116   /* Initialize the EBI structure parameters values                                                         */
00117   EBI_InitStruct->EBI_Bank = EBI_BANK_0;
00118   EBI_InitStruct->EBI_Mode = EBI_MODE_D8A8;
00119   EBI_InitStruct->EBI_IdleCycle = EBI_IDLECYCLE_DISABLE;
00120   EBI_InitStruct->EBI_ChipSelectPolarity = EBI_CHIPSELECTPOLARITY_LOW;
00121   EBI_InitStruct->EBI_AddressLatchPolarity = EBI_ADDRESSLATCHPOLARITY_LOW;
00122   EBI_InitStruct->EBI_WriteEnablePolarity = EBI_WRITEENABLEPOLARITY_LOW;
00123   EBI_InitStruct->EBI_ReadEnablePolarity = EBI_READENABLEPOLARITY_LOW;
00124   EBI_InitStruct->EBI_IdleCycleTime = 0xF;
00125   EBI_InitStruct->EBI_AddressSetupTime = 0xF;
00126   EBI_InitStruct->EBI_AddressHoldTime = 0xF;
00127   EBI_InitStruct->EBI_WriteSetupTime = 0xF;
00128   EBI_InitStruct->EBI_WriteStrobeTime = 0x3F;
00129   EBI_InitStruct->EBI_WriteHoldTime = 0xF;
00130   EBI_InitStruct->EBI_ReadSetupTime = 0xF;
00131   EBI_InitStruct->EBI_ReadStrobeTime = 0x3F;
00132   EBI_InitStruct->EBI_ReadHoldTime = 0xF;
00133 }
00134 
00135 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00136  * @brief  Enable or Disable the EBI peripheral.
00137  * @param  EBI_Bank: EBI Bank.
00138  *   This parameter can be one of the following values:
00139  *     @arg EBI_BANK_0 : EBI Bank 0
00140  *     @arg EBI_BANK_1 : EBI Bank 1
00141  *     @arg EBI_BANK_2 : EBI Bank 2
00142  *     @arg EBI_BANK_3 : EBI Bank 3
00143  * @param  NewState: This parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
00144  * @retval None
00145  ************************************************************************************************************/
00146 void EBI_Cmd(u32 EBI_Bank, ControlStatus NewState)
00147 {
00148   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00149   Assert_Param(IS_EBI_BANK(EBI_Bank));
00150   Assert_Param(IS_CONTROL_STATUS(NewState));
00151 
00152   if (NewState != DISABLE)
00153   {
00154     HT_EBI->CR |= (0x100 << EBI_Bank);
00155   }
00156   else
00157   {
00158     HT_EBI->CR &= ~(0x100 << EBI_Bank);
00159   }
00160 }
00161 
00162 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00163  * @brief  Check whether the specified EBI busy flag has been set.
00164  * @retval SET or RESET
00165  ************************************************************************************************************/
00166 FlagStatus EBI_GetBusyStatus(void)
00167 {
00168   if (HT_EBI->SR & 0x1)
00169   {
00170     return SET;
00171   }
00172   else
00173   {
00174     return RESET;
00175   }
00176 }
